Description.Name: Carrier
Description.Details: A direct fire, support platform; the Arrow V carrier is the Society's pre-eminent artillery and anti air platform. A simple design, the carrier is an updated version of the various carrier platforms used by both the Clans and the Inner Sphere down the centuries. Swapping the traditional ICE for a Fuel Cell allowed the designers to up-armor the chassis and install a front mounted AMS turret. An integral Nova CEWS combines the role of C3 network, ecm shield and high powered sensor array, further protecting the Carrier and it's allies. The remaining weight is dedicated to a pair of immense Arrow V's and 9 tons of ammo in a CASE protected munitions bay. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. Fuel Cell: Improved vehicle engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 3/5 Hex: 90/120 Meters.

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
